abstract: The Wuhan outbreak shows that the Chinese government didn’t learn enough from the SARS epidemic.
lead_paragraph: On Sunday, a friend of mine in China wrote an ominous, two-word post on WeChat: “Broke out.” He meant that a mysterious surge in cases of pneumonia in Wuhan, a city in central China, was, in fact, an outbreak of something more serious.
keywords: Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention
